alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:59PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ITASCA AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM CDT... At 1158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Nashwauk, to 6 miles north of Taconite, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hibbing around 1210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Keewatin, Nashwauk and Pengilly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca
